entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: The person Harry wants to find, mentioned by the woman as not living there.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is trying to find Gregorovitch and has a wand.

entities.name: the woman
entities.description: A person who lives in the house and does not want Harry to enter.

entities.name: the children
entities.description: Two young children who come running into the hall when the woman screams.

relationships.description: Harry is searching for Gregorovitch, as mentioned in his dialogue.
Harry is confronting the woman who does not want him to enter her house.
The woman claims she knows Gregorovitch and that he no longer lives there.
Harry is not directly related to the children, but they are present in the scene.
